name: BNNSArithmeticUnary
desc: A structure that contains the input and output of an arithmetic operation with a single input.

items.name: init(in: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, in_type: BNNSDescriptorType, out: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, out_type: BNNSDescriptorType)
items.desc: Returns a new arithmetic structure that takes a single input from the specified parameters.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Returns a new arithmetic structure that takes a single input.

items.name: var in_type: BNNSDescriptorType
items.desc: The descriptor type of the input.

items.name: var out_type: BNNSDescriptorType
items.desc: The descriptor type of the output.
